name: Lewis the horror game
description: It's been 17 years... As the cicadas began their crawl from a long slumber, so does the vengeful spirit of our old friend Lewis. Revising a broken memory lost in time, you are to face your fears and go to the place where it all began. Solve puzzles, uncover mysteries, and last but not least.. DON'T GET CAUGHT!! Grandpa Lewis has been waiting.. do you have what it takes to uncover the story that started it all? Lewis the horror game is the fourth and final installment in the Idle series. Acting as a stand alone "point and click" horror game, the final pieces lurk in the shadows to complete this dark and twisted story.
